item.title: Calculus I Resources
item.description: Office Hours Dr. Shizhu’s Classes (Sections 4 and 5) Tuesdays, 12-1pm, Zoom (link on Brightspace) Thursdays, 2:30-3:30pm, Warren Weaver 524 Dr. Espinosa’s Classes (Sections 9 and 10) Tuesdays, 3:45-4:45pm, Warren Weaver 228 Thursdays, 3:45-4:45pm, Warren Weaver 228 Resources I’ve Created How to Ace a College Math Class L’Hopital’s Rule Flowchart Cengage Chapter 1 Notes: Functions and Limits Cengage Chapter 2 Notes: Derivatives Cengage Chapter 3 Notes: Inverse Functions Cengage Chapter 4 Notes: Applications of Differentiation Cengage Chapter 5 Notes: Integrals Additional Math Resources Algebra/trig review: Paul’s Online Math Notes Calculus companion book: The Calculus Lifesaver General math help: Khan Academy Graphing functions: Desmos Checking derivatives: Derivative Calculator Checking integrals: Integral Calculator Mental Health Resources Moses Center for Student Accessibility Wellness Exchange (call for a Crisis Response Counselor)

item.title: Linear Algebra Resources
item.description: Office Hours Thursdays, 11am-1pm, Warren Weaver 228 Fridays, 10:30am-11:30am, Warren Weaver 228 Fridays, 3pm-4pm, Zoom Outlines Chapter 1: Vectors and Matrices Chapter 2: Solving Linear Equations Chapter 3: The Four Fundamental Subspaces These outlines are based on Dr. Ralph Chikhany’s lecture slides, Strang, and Euclidean Linear Algebra by Connor Ahlbach. Recitation Solutions Recitation 1: Sections 1.1-1.3 Recitation 2: Sections 2.1-2.4 Recitation 3: Sections 2.5-2.7 Recitation 4: Sections 3.1-3.2 Recitation 5: Sections 3.
